name: Cafe Battle
summary: Café Battle is a cute, but exciting game for 2 players. In this game, there are two adorable witches who want to own their Café. Your tasks are to align with the cute witches, battle your friends & family, and acquire customers as many as possible to win! Swipe your finger to hurl magic balls and leverage 10 unique magic spells to battle your friends & family and to acquire more customers! Adorable roles, exciting battles, and 2 player mode are the three reasons you should play it with your friends & family now!
